org.hibernate.loader.internal

Class AbstractLoadQueryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.loader.internal.AbstractLoadQueryImpl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractEntityLoadQueryImpl

    public abstract class AbstractLoadQueryImpl
extends Object
    Represents a generic load query used for generating SQL. This code is based on the SQL generation code originally in org.hibernate.loader.JoinWalker.
